pageProduct.name: Avene Gentle Protective Toner 200mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Gentle toner for dry to very dry sensitive skin.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only.

Common Uses

Non-drying gentle toning lotion which completes make-up removal and soothes dry to very dry sensitive skin. Leaves the skin soft and comfortable. Alcohol-free, paraben-free.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE. PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE. PHENOXYETHANOL. STEARALKONIUM HECTORITE. TRISODIUM EDTA. WATER (AQUA)

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening onto face with a cotton pad after cleansing with the Gentle milk cleanser or the cleanser of your choice. Follow with a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water. Shake well before use.
